page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: The area is quiet and rural, the countryside green gently undulating pasture land and woodland.The two villages{Borwick}and{Priest Hutton}are quiet and picturesque and contain only one or two local shops.Many of the inhabitants tend to work and shop in {Carnforth}or{Lancaster}to the south or {Kendal}to the north.With the closing down of the limestone quarries farming is the main occupation within the area, although many of the farms now run caravan sites on their land for the tourists who find the beauty and quietness very attractive. Further evidence of the change is evident in the large number of farm buildings that have been converted to dwellings many for people working outside the area and for holiday homes.
